function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in people queuing in front of Centrelink offices","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to crowding and close contact","Mitigation":"Implement measures to enforce social distancing and reduce crowd size","Technologies":"Queue management software, digital appointment booking systems","People":"People queuing in front of Centrelink offices","Owner":"Government, Centrelink management"},{"Description":"Job losses of 14%-25% with low-income workers twice as likely to be affected","Impact":"Increased economic hardship and potential increase in public health risks due to financial stress","Mitigation":"Implement support programs, financial aid, and job creation initiatives to address unemployment","Technologies":"Online job portals, skill development platforms, remote work technologies","People":"Low-income workers, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government, NGOs, private sector"},{"Description":"Systematic flaws in the operation of state enforcement regimes, resulting in widespread employer non-compliance","Impact":"Increased risk of underpayment and mistreatment, leading to potential public health issues and reduced ability to access healthcare","Mitigation":"Strengthen enforcement mechanisms, improve oversight, and increase penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Compliance tracking software, digital reporting systems, data analytics for monitoring","People":"Temporary migrants, vulnerable workers","Owner":"Government agencies, labor unions, non-governmental organizations"}]}
